title: Finding the Determinant
text: The determinant is given by $$a d-b c$$, which evaluates to $$(-32-15)$$, or $$-47$$.

title: Multiplying the Determinant with the Changed Matrix
text: We must modify the matrix into the form $$\begin{bmatrix} d & -b \\ -c & a \end{bmatrix}$$. We now have $$\begin{bmatrix} 8 & 3 \\ 5 & -4 \end{bmatrix}$$. Dividing this by the determinant gives us $$\begin{bmatrix} \frac{-8}{47} & \frac{3}{47} \\ \frac{5}{47} & \frac{-4}{47} \end{bmatrix}$$
